::WindRider::
WindRider could sit still no longer. He stood up, and
transformed again. He hovered in the air a few feet
above the ground, and motioned for Battera to
accompany him. He just wanted to fly, and enjoy
feeling the currents beneath his wings.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera:;
> 
> She smiled and watched him sit.  She looked at
> him,"Sorry" was all 
> she could say to him.  She thought he was odd for a
> bot.  She had 
> never met one quite like him before.  One that
> wanted peace almost as 
> much as she did.  She smiled and then looked out at
> the beautiful 
> surroundings and landscape.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > (OOC: this will be my last post for a while, as Im
> > about to go watch Beast Wars. Can't miss that!
> lol)
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider sensed that Battera felt a little uneasy
> and
> > took his arm from around her. He felt stupid
> because
> > he could be so impulsive sometimes. He sat down on
> the
> > ground, taking in the beauty all around him.
> 
> 
>
